videos.title: 🔁 Master For Loop in Golang for Interviews! | Explained in 60s
videos.description:
🚀 Crack Golang interviews by mastering the only loop in Go: the `for` loop!

💡 In this video, you'll learn:
- ✅ How the `for` loop works in Golang
- 🔄 Traditional, while-style, and infinite for loops
- 🛑 Using `break` and `continue`
- 🧠 Why Go doesn’t have `while` or `do-while`

📌 Perfect for:
- Interview preparation
- Go language beginners
- Quick syntax recap

🔎 Topics Covered:
- Syntax overview
- Code examples
- Loop variations in table format

🔥 Don’t forget to like 👍, comment 💬, and subscribe 🔔 for more Golang interview tips!

#golang #forloop #gointerview #codinginterview #shorts #godeveloper #programmingtips #looplogic #interviewshorts
